.. _`sleuth_lrt`:

SLEUTH_LRT
==========

Perform a likelyhood ration test






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_sleuth_lrt:
        input:
            rds = "wald_test.rds"
        output:
            rds = "lrt.rds"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/sleuth/lrt"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
